backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing user profiles, question management, full syllabus and chapter-wise test creation/management, test attempts with section-based timing, leaderboard functionality, and role-based access control (admin/student) using AccessControl and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three high-confidence features related to fixing admin navigation link visibility: updating Navbar.tsx conditional rendering, debugging useGetCallerUserRole hook, and adding diagnostic console logging.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and styles, with specific notes about admin role verification fixes, navigation routes, and diagnostic logging implementations.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for the Concept Delta navy blue theme, including sidebar, chart, and UI component color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with meta tags, SEO description for Concept Delta MHT-CET platform, and root div for React application mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring QueryClient, TanStack Router with route tree, ThemeProvider for dark/light mode, and Toaster for notifications in StrictMode.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying Concept Delta branding, quick links (Home, Dashboard, YouTube), social media handle, copyright notice, and caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout wrapper component that renders Navbar, main content outlet, and Footer in a flex column structure for consistent page layout.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Navigation bar with Concept Delta branding, conditional rendering of Dashboard and Admin links based on authentication and UserRole__1.admin enum check, Internet Identity login/logout, responsive mobile menu, and comprehensive diagnostic console logging for debugging admin link visibility.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity login state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useChapterWiseTestMut: Provides React Query mutations for creating chapter-wise tests and assigning questions to them, with automatic cache invalidation on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useFullSyllabusTestMu: Exports mutations for creating full syllabus tests and assigning questions to test sections, invalidating the fullSyllabusTests query cache after successful operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching full syllabus tests, chapter-wise tests, questions, user profiles, user roles, and test attempts from the backend actor.
Provides a mutation hook for creating questions with admin authorization checks, detailed error logging, and automatic query invalidation with toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useTestSectionMutatio: Exports mutations for starting and submitting test sections with answers, invalidating test attempt queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, plus responsive styles for hero images.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminChapterWiseTestC: Admin page for creating chapter-wise tests with question selection, validation for test parameters (name, marks, duration), and automatic navigation after successful creation.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard with tabs for analytics, test management, question gallery, and user management; displays full syllabus and chapter-wise tests with access control for admin-only users.
frontend/src/pages/AdminFullSyllabusTest: Admin page for creating full syllabus tests with two sections (Physics/Chemistry and Maths), allowing question selection per section with validation and success handling.
frontend/src/pages/AdminQuestionCreate.t: Admin form for creating questions with text/image support for both questions and options, including subject, class level, correct answer selection, and explanation fields.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page featuring hero banner, YouTube subscription call-to-action, Telegram community link, and feature highlights for MHT-CET exam preparation platform.
frontend/src/pages/Leaderboard.tsx: Displays top 10 test results in a leaderboard with medal icons for top 3 ranks, showing user names, scores, and completion times. Includes navigation back to dashboard and authentication checks.
frontend/src/pages/ResultPage.tsx: Shows detailed test attempt results including score breakdown, question-by-question analysis, and performance statistics. Provides PDF export functionality for results and handles both full syllabus and chapter-wise tests.
frontend/src/pages/StudentDashboard.tsx: Main student dashboard displaying available full syllabus and chapter-wise tests with start test functionality. Shows test details like duration, questions count, and allows students to begin test attempts.
frontend/src/pages/TestInterface.tsx: Interactive test-taking interface with timer, question navigation, answer selection, and section management. Handles section transitions, auto-submission on timeout, and tracks user answers throughout the test.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines all application routes using TanStack Router including landing, dashboards, admin pages, test interface, results, and leaderboard. Sets up route hierarchy with Layout as root component.
frontend/src/utils/pdfExport.ts: Generates HTML-based PDF exports of test results with detailed statistics, question-by-question breakdown, and performance analysis. Creates formatted printable reports for both full syllabus and chapter-wise tests.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support and functions to clear parameters from URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH color space (including sidebar, chart, and semantic colors), container settings, border radius variables, custom animations (accordion), and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state document for 'Concept Delta' MHT-CET mock test platform describing architecture (Motoko backend, React frontend, Internet Identity auth), features (full syllabus and chapter-wise tests, admin panel, leaderboards, PDF export), and known issues including admin authorization bugs.
